thread.title: Chicago Woman Brings Personal Experience to Care for Sex-Trafficking Victims
thread.title_full: Chicago Woman Brings Personal Experience to Care for Sex-Trafficking Victims - WSJ

author: Shibani Mahtani
title: Chicago Woman Brings Personal Experience to Care for Sex-Trafficking Victims
text:
CHICAGOâ€”Marian Hatcher still remembers the first woman she helped, an 18-year old who had been lured to Chicago on the promise of a career in modeling but instead fell victim to sex trafficking and continued in prostitution for years to support her 2-year-old child.
She says she was able to reach the woman more effectively than her colleagues in...
